thread.title: Shorts confusion forces GWS costume change
thread.title_full: Shorts confusion forces GWS costume change

title: Shorts confusion forces GWS costume change
text:
GWS Giants forced to change shorts after early uniform confusion in AFLW clash against Fremantle.  25pm by Staff Writers Source: FOX SPORTS GWS has been forced to change shorts mid-match after both the Giants and their opponents Fremantle ran out for their AFLW clash in similar attire. 
Both the Giants and the Dockers stepped out onto the Blacktown International Sportspark on Saturday afternoon donning white shorts and jumpers that had dark numbers plastered on a white background. 
The clash in strips caused confusion among on-lookers, with the Giants forced to change into charcoal shorts at quarter-time. 
Tradtionally, the home team — in this case the Giants — wears coloured shorts and the away team dons white shorts. 
The jumper-short fiasco comes after Geelong unveiled its new 2017 pre-season attire against Hawthorn on Friday night. 
Some members of the AFL community took to Twitter to voice their frustration. Who likes white shorts?
